org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.data.redis

接口 JedisClientConfigurationBuilderCustomizer

  • 函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface JedisClientConfigurationBuilderCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be implemented by beans wishing to customize the JedisClientConfiguration via a JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder whilst retaining default auto-configuration.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void customize(org.springframework.data.redis.connection.jedis.JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder clientConfigurationBuilder)
      Customize the JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder.

    • 方法详细资料

      • customize

        void customize(org.springframework.data.redis.connection.jedis.JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder clientConfigurationBuilder)
        Customize the JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder.
        参数:
        clientConfigurationBuilder - the builder to customize
